column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhaw no ekyir no
column3: EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar dɛ
column6: ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu do dze rokɔ no
column7: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column8: hɔn a wotum ɔsa kɔ wɔ Israel nyinara."

column2: "Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar nye hɔn kasae wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan nkyɛn dɛ
column5: ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu do dze rokɔ no; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses nye Israelmba a wofi Egypt asaase do bae no."

column2: "Reuben
column3: Israel n'abakan no: Reuben ne mbabanyin; Hanok dze

column2: "Hezron dze
"Iyinom nye Reubenfo ebusua ebusua: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduanan ebiasa nye ahaesuon eduasa."
"Na Pallu ne ba; Eliab."
"Na Eliab ne mbabanyin; Nemuel
column5: nye Abiram no a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn wɔ mboanofo no mu no a wɔhaam Moses nye Aaron ho wɔ Kora no kuw no mu
column6: wɔ aber a wɔhaam EWURADZE ho:"

column2: "na asaase buee n'ano
column3: na ɔmemeen hɔn dze kaa Kora ho
column4: aber a kuw no wuwui no; wɔ aber a ogya memeen nyimpa ahaenu eduonum

column2: "Naaso Kora ne mbabanyin no dze
"Simeon ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee: Nemuel dze
"Zera dze
"Iyinom nye Simeonfo ebusua
"Gad ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee: Zefon dze
"Ozni dze
"Arod dze
"Iyinom nye Gad ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse
"Juda ne mbabanyin
column3: Er nye Onan: na Er nye Onan wowui wɔ Keenan asaase do."

column2: "Na Juda ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee nye yi; Sela dze
"Na Perez ne mbabanyin nye yi; Hezron dze
"Iyinom nye Juda ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse
"Isakar ne mbabanyin: Tola dze
"Jasub dze
"Iyinom nye Isakar ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse
"Zebulun ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Sered dze
"Iyinom nye Zebulunfo ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse
"Josef ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Manaasɛ nye Efraim."
"Manaasɛ ne mbabanyin: Makir dze
column3: Makirfo ebusua: na Makir woo Gilead: Gilead dze

column2: "Iyinom nye Gilead ne mbabanyin: Iezer dze
"na Asriel dze
"na Semida dze
"Na Hefer ne babanyin Zelofehad ennya mbabanyin
column3: na onyaa mbabaa: na Zelofehad ne mbabaa edzin nye Mahala

column2: "Iyinom nye Manaasɛ ebusua: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduonum ebien nye ahaesuon."
"Iyinom nye Efraim ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Sutela dze
"Na iyinom nye Sutela ne mbabanyin: Eran dze
"Iyinom nye Efraim ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse
column3: mpemeduasa ebien nye ahaenum. Iyinom nye Josef ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Benjamin ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Bela dze
"Sefufam dze
"Na Bela ne mbabanyin nye Ard nye Naaman: Ard dze
"Iyinom nye Benjamin ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduanan enum nye ahaesia."
"Iyinom nye Dan ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Suham dze
column3: Suhamfo ebusua. Iyinom nye Dan ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Suhamfo ebusua nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse

column2: "Aser ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Imna dze
"Beria ne mbabanyin dze: Heber dze
"Na Aser ne babaa ne dzin dze Sera."
"Iyinom nye Aser ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse
"Naftali ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Jahzeel dze
"Jezer dze
"Iyinom nye Naftali ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduanan enum nye ahaanan."
"Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Israelmba mu
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Iyinom na wɔnkyɛ asaase no mma hɔn dɛ egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse."

column2: "Nyia ɔso no ma no egyapadze a ɔso
column3: na nyia osuar no ma no egyapadze a osuar: obiara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn no mu tse no na wɔmfa n'egyapadze mma no."

column2: "Naaso asaase no wɔmfa tonto nkyɛ: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw edzin tsetsee no na wonnya egyapadze no."
"Dɛ mbrɛ tonto no tse no na wɔmfa nkyɛ hɔn egyapadze no mma hɔn a wɔso nye hɔn a wosuar."
"Na iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Levifo mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Gerson dze
"Iyinom nye Levi ebusua ebusua: Libnifo ebusua
column5: Korafo ebusua. Na Kohat woo Amram."

column2: "Na Amram ne yer dzin dze Jokebed
column3: Levi ne babaa a wɔwoo no ma Levi wɔ Egypt no a: na ɔwoo Aaron nye Moses nye hɔn akyerɛbaa Miriam maa Amram."

column2: "Na Aaron so wɔwoo Nadab nye Abihu
"Na Nadab nye Abihu wuwui
column3: wɔ aber a wɔdze ananagya baa EWURADZE enyim no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduonu ebiasa
column3: banyin biara a oedzi bosoom nye ekyir no: na wɔannkan hɔn ammfora Israelmba
column4: osiandɛ wɔamma hɔn egyapadze wɔ Israelmba no mu."

column2: "Iyinom nye hɔn a Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar kaan hɔn no; hɔn a wɔkaan Israelmba wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan ho no a."
"Na iyinom mu dze ɔbanyin biara nnyi mu a ofi hɔn a Moses nye ɔsɔfo Aaron kaan hɔn wɔ aber a wɔkaan Israelmba wɔ Sinai sar do no mu."
"Na EWURADZE aka no wɔ hɔn ho dɛ
column3: Owu na wobowuwu wɔ sar no do. Na hɔn mu nyimpa biara annka
